org.taeradan.ahp
Class Criteria

java.lang.Object
  org.taeradan.ahp.Criteria

public class Criteria
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the criterias of the AHP tree, it contains Indicators and it executes its part of the AHP algorithm.

Author:
Yves Dubromelle
